title: Uniform rank metric stability of Lie algebras, Lie groups and lattices
abstract:
We study uniform stability of discrete groups, Lie groups and Lie algebras in
the rank metric, and the connections between uniform stability of these
objects. We prove that semisimple Lie algebras are far from being flexibly
$\mathbb{C}$-stable, and that semisimple Lie groups and lattices in semisimple
Lie groups of higher rank are not strictly $\mathbb{C}$-stable. Furthermore, we
prove that free groups are not uniformly flexibly $F$-stable over any field
$F$.
